QuestData.Title: Something to Wear
QuestData.Description: I've got an idea for how you can get close to their leaders without getting killed. But first, you're going to need to find something to wear.$B$BMy suggestion is that you head up there and get their armor from them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 pieces of Twilight's Hammer Armor.
QuestData.CompletionText: How much of that armor have you collected?$B$BYou're going to want to be well disguised for the next thing that you're going to have to do.
QuestData.RewardText: <Lakota looks worried about the condition of the armor, especially the bloodstains.>$B$BYou sure don't fool around, do you, $n? Well, it'll have to do.
